RT @taxmarch .@SenBooker just released an alarming report on how drug companies are raising prices despite receiving billions in tax cuts. 

While they're pocketing profits, people like Steve Gomez are struggling to afford their children's life-saving medications. Nancy has been traveling across the country with the @TaxMarch & allies, informing the public about what's at stake & holding Republicans accountable for claiming the #TrumpTax is a 'middle income tax cut' when in fact a whopping 83% of the benefits are going to the top 1%! 📺 http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/986002421125070849/pu/img/PBUoGHyeVqcOun8E.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/986002421125070849/pu/vid/320x180/Dha_ROtte5_Gt03I.mp4

Just notified that due to brain injuries to diplomats in #Havana #Canada has designated embassy in #Cuba to ‘unaccompanied post’ & personnel will no longer be joined by family. Will also review all positions in Cuba to balance staff safety with need to deliver services on island
I thank @POTUS for his leadership on this issue, and urge my fellow Americans to join us in the fight to #StopEverydayKillers. #CrisisNextDoor

Today I visited the “Prescribed to Death” memorial on the ellipse to honor the memory of victims of the opioid crisis. The opioid epidemic continues to hurt families across the country, and mine was no exception. #CrisisNextDoor http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Da8a874VwAAEtcW.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Da8a876UwAAWAgD.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Da8a875VAAEi3Fr.jpg

Deeply saddened by the death of Doris Ward. She was the first Black woman to lead the San Francisco Board of Supervisors -- a true trailblazer who I was fortunate to call my friend. She will be dearly missed. https://www.sfgate.com/bayarea/article/Doris-Ward-first-black-woman-to-lead-SF-Board-of-12837761.php
